name: Gumi's Run
description:
RUN GUMI!  LOOK OUT!  Help Gumi run from the boulder by jumping over various obstacles while charging down the hill and safely arrive at the bottom. 

You can play this game using only one button, however, this "Jump" button may be used repeatedly while still in the air for up to a triple jump.  

On a gamepad controller, the bottom face button ("X" on Playstation and "A" on XBox controllers) will allow you to perform the jump maneuvers to make your way through the game.  Additionally, you may also use a keyboard where Spacebar, "W", and the Up key all accept input for the jump ability.   Press Q or Esc to quit.
